articles.author: Way Mullery, Marco Chacon, Annette Choi
articles.title: Who sits where at Trump’s joint session address: A visual guide - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump will address a joint session of the 119th Congress on Tuesday for the first time in his second term. House Speaker Mike Johnson formally invited Trump in late January to speak, asking the president to share his “America First vision for…
